amendment.description: To restore a provision regarding fees to cover the full costs of all adjudication services.

vote.text: Amendment SA 107 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 107 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S1406-1408; text: CR S1407) To restore a provision regarding fees to cover the full costs of all adjudication services.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 107 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 107 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kennedy.
